DOC.brief_summary: This study test safety effectiveness acupuncture control pain related removal partially impacted mandibular third molar . Acupuncture Chinese art heal insert needle skin . Participants age 18 - 40 give initial x-ray determine one low molar partially bony impact . Eligible participant undergo standard oral surgery remove impact molar . A local anesthetic use prior surgery . Directly surgery participant assign one three group . Participants able select group assign . Participants receive either real sham ( fake ) acupuncture treatment post-extraction pain . After initial acupuncture treatment , participant require remain six hour dental site monitor . If participant discomfort measure moderate high second acupuncture treatment administer . All participant administer questionnaire day surgery . Participants also require complete two diary seven day follow surgery . On seventh day , participant return stitch remove hand complete diary .
DOC.brief_title: Use Acupuncture Dental Pain : Testing Model
DOC.criteria: At least one low mandibular molar partial bony impaction General good health Minimum body weight 99 lb . Able read write English
